overview: Sweet Melancholy juxtaposes feelings of melancholy and joy to show how it has felt to grieve a loved one. Grieving is not always crying, but it can also be reminiscing on memories you had with that person. Now those memories, even though sweet, are tinged with a bit of sadness.
tagline: Now those memories, even though sweet, are tinged with a bit of sadness.
title: Sweet Melancholy
